Medium: 9 woodcuts and 2 photoengravings (including dust jacket), 1 printed black and 10 printed in color; artist's woodcut monogram on folio 1 (repeated on colophon, and relief printed in wrapper front); and ornamental woodcut on colophon
Dimensions: page  19 3/16 x 13 1/16" (48 x 33.2 cm)  Prints:  various dimensions.
Title: IN MEMORIAM: PIER PAOLO PASOLINI, UNA DISPERATA VITALITÁ
